name: Truth as a Disruptive Weapon
description: Using irrefutable facts, logic, and consistency to break through PSN deception and manipulation.

cards.title: Detecting and Unmasking Deception
cards.description: Recognizing deception patterns and exposing hidden inconsistencies.
bulletpoints: Identifying contradictions in speech and behavior that indicate deception.
Using precise questioning to expose logical inconsistencies.
Recognizing when emotional manipulation is being used to distort reality.
cards.summaryText: Spot contradictions in speech and behavior that signal deception, use precise questioning to expose logical inconsistencies, and recognize when emotional manipulation is distorting reality.

cards.title: The Power of Documented Truth
cards.description: Using written, recorded, and verifiable evidence to shut down manipulative narratives.
bulletpoints: Keeping records of past statements to reveal contradictions.
Utilizing audio, video, and text documentation to create an undeniable trail of truth.
Leveraging third-party confirmation to strengthen credibility.
cards.summaryText: Keep records of past statements to reveal contradictions, use audio, video, and text documentation to create an undeniable truth trail, and leverage third-party confirmation to strengthen credibility.

cards.title: Pattern Recognition in Manipulation
cards.description: Recognizing repeated patterns in PSN behavior and using them against them.
bulletpoints: Analyzing historical patterns of manipulation to predict future tactics.
Documenting behavioral loops that reveal PSN operating structures.
Using data-driven truth as a means to counter long-term deception.
cards.summaryText: Analyze historical manipulation patterns to predict future tactics, document behavioral loops that reveal PSN operating structures, and use data-driven truth to counter long-term deception.
